channel.title: Luminosity 474 V1 || Great Starter base [First Release]
channel.description:
[b][font=impact][size=24pt]Luminosity 474[/size][/font][/b]
[b][size=18pt]Features[/size][/b]
[b][size=18pt]Other[/size][/b]
[font=verdana][color=green]Started shortcuts Fully working reporting system, read, writes, checks and loads the player from a file. New Travelling system Most npcs added Clipped following New clan chat system Started on most objects used Fixed switching - a lot smoother and faster Added a fully working gliding system Just finished the new Membership system, works beautifully Created a PathFinder system[/font] Fully working boat system - all boats work Ring of Duelling and glory works Spirit trees all work Fully working skillcapes - can't move whilst emote is active Every single random event, fully working Treasure trails Chaos Tunnel Drop party system Clipped npcs Flower planting - 100% clipped, pickable and all flowers work
[b][size=18pt]Minigames[/size][/b]
Pyramid plunder added - 4 working floors, receive sceptre's and statues. Occasional anti-poisons collected and a one minute timer Fully working Pest control; all monsters, real timers and portals work Tzhaar fight pits; correct countdown and winners Tzhaar fight caves; 63 waves Warriors guild; animated armours and defenders from cyclops's Barrows; all barrows bosses with digging and the correct tunnel for rewards Duel arena; all features working Zombie minigame; needs few adjustments Fishing trawler; basic shop and timer
[b][size=18pt]Skills[/size][/b]
Clipped firemaking + all logs works including different coloured logs Woodcutting fully working, with stumps and birdnests Mining fully working with ores dissapearing Fully working herblore with all levels and ingredients working Cooking; every food-type cook-able and burning Agility fully working with every location; including barbarian assault Runecrafting working with talisman locating Crafting fully working; all leathers and bars Thieving with working with random events Fletching; every single log in the database (cut-able) Fishing; all fish fish-able Farming; all seeds farm-able
[b][size=18pt]Media[/size][/b]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/15oic1j.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2i9ms6v.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/jqsw37.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/vh6fkg.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/vy8al1.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/10icob4.gif[/img]
[b][size=18pt]Downloads[/size][/b] Package: [url=http://uppit.com/g0axa78md9aj/Luminosity_474.rar]http://uppit.com/g0axa78md9aj/Luminosity_474.rar[/url] Source: [url=http://uppit.com/sor6fiozfan4/Luminosity_474.rar]http://uppit.com/sor6fiozfan4/Luminosity_474.rar[/url] Client: [url=http://uppit.com/sor6fiozfan4/Luminosity_474.rar]http://uppit.com/sor6fiozfan4/Luminosity_474.rar[/url]
[b][size=18pt]Credits[/size][/b] 95% Sanity For base 5% Me for adding a few things
